import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardImg, CardBody, CardFooter, Button, Row, Col } from "shards-react"; import Img from "react-image"; const Overview = props => (

The letter writing section on your exam is optional and you can instead choose to write a Composition. However, if you choose to do this question is is important to know what is required and how your letter is to be structured.

It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like). ); export default Overview;
